bill.title: Budget Act of 2009.
bill.description: An act to amend Sections 2550, 2558.46, 17070.766, 42238.146, 42605, 44259, 45023.1, 45023.4, 46010.2, and 52124.3 of, to amend, repeal, and add Section 17587 of, and to add and repeal Section 52055.60 of, the Education Code, to amend Sections 7906 and 8880.5 of the Government Code, to amend Items 6110-488, 6440-001-0001, 6610-001-0001, and 6870-101-0001 of Section 2.00 of, and to amend Section 12.42 of, the Budget Act of 2008 (Chapters 268 and 269 of the Statutes of 2008), and to amend Section 42 of Chapter 12 of the Statutes of 2009, relating to education finance, making an appropriation therefor, and declaring the urgency thereof, to take effect immediately.

history.action: Introduced. To Com. on RLS. for assignment. To print.
From print. May be acted upon on or after February 20.
Withdrawn from committee. Placed on second reading file.
Read second time. To third reading.
Read third time. Passed. (Ayes 22. Noes 14. Page 509.) To Assembly.
In Assembly. Read first time. Held at Desk.
Read second time. To third reading.
Read third time. Amended. (Page 2253.) Read third time. Urgency clause adopted. Passed. (Ayes 68. Noes 0. Page 2267.) To Senate.

In Senate. Urgency clause refused adoption. Senate refuses to concur in Assembly amendments. (Ayes 21. Noes 14. Page 1467.) Motion to reconsider made by Senator Ducheny. Reconsideration granted. (Ayes 34. Noes 0. Page 1467.)

Urgency clause refused adoption. Senate refuses to concur in Assembly amendments. (Ayes 21. Noes 15. Page 1523.) Senate Rule 43 suspended. (Ayes 23. Noes 13. Page 1523.) Motion to reconsider made by Senator Ducheny. Reconsideration granted. (Ayes 23. Noes 13. Page 1524.)
Urgency clause refused adoption. Senate refuses to concur in Assembly amendments. (Ayes 25. Noes 14. Page 1553.)
